title: Appleâ€™s Own Privacy Nutrition Labels
content:
Transparency is the best policy.

Our privacy labels are designed to help you understand how apps handle your data, including apps we develop at Apple. This page brings privacy labels for our iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS apps together in one place.

https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT211973

Clock

Apple

Data Not Linked to You

DATA_NOT_LINKED_TO_YOU

The following data may be collected but it is not linked to your identity:

https://support.apple.com/kb/HT211970

Data Not Linked to You

DATA_NOT_LINKED_TO_YOU

The following data, which may be collected but is not linked to your identity, may be used for the following purposes:

https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/en-ww/
